summary: This mod includes a dagger, two one-handed swords and one two-handed axe which are both melee and ranged bullet shooting weapon.
descriptionHtml:
This mod includes a dagger, two one-handed swords and one two-handed axe which are both melee and ranged bullet shooting weapon.
---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------



Before you read. please watching Video clip




----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
1.2 Update

-damdage-

Gatling Axe : *0.15 of the level of either Archery or Two-handed, whichever the level is the highest.

Revolver Dagger : *0.25 of the level of either Archery or One-handed, whichever the level is the highest.

Magnum Sword : *0.4 of the level of either Archery or One-handed, whichever the level is the highest.

Gun Sword : *0.25 of the level of either Archery or One-handed, whichever the level is the highest.


Can Using on Ride a horse




before you install v1.2
please delete all last version files and save









Gatling Axe can, as the name suggests, fire the projectiles if you press the button constantly.

Revolver Dagger is just a pistol.

Magnum Sword is a shotgun.

Gun Sword is a rifle.



When you equip duel Gunblade, the projectiles change depending on the weapon on the right hand.

If you equip an ordinary weapon, not the Gunblade weapons, the duelweilding actions will not work properly.


* If you want to combine the gunblade with ordinary weapons, you must equip the gunblade on the left hand. 
In order to prevent any unnecessary crash, please equip the weapons of this version.

* There is no unique actions for dagger duelwielding.

* Equipping shields and magics will cause no problem at all.


Right hand Revolver Dagger : Causes red explosion
Right hand Magnum Sword : Fire explosion
Roght hand Gun Sword : Shock explosion



Gun Sword, Revolver Dagger, Gatling axe is able to using on Ride a horse

But do not use Magnum Sword when you riding a horse

-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
-Damage-

5
Gatling Axe : *0.3 of the level of either Archery or Two-handed, whichever the level is the highest.

Revolver Dagger : *0.5 of the level of either Archery or One-handed, whichever the level is the highest.

Magnum Sword : *0.5 of the level of either Archery or One-handed, whichever the level is the highest.

Gun Sword : *0.5 of the level of either Archery or One-handed, whichever the level is the highest.




-Hotkey-

* The fire button is the wheel button on the mouse

* There is no hotkey for Xbox controller.


------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

-Installation-

* SKSE is essential.
(It is up to you to find out how to install SKSE)

* DawnGuard is essential.

* I cannot guarentee the mod to function in lower version than the latest.



* Main File is a scripted applied and fire-ready version.
It can be cafted in Steel menu
You do mot need the perk.



* Option File Dwarven Gun Blade-No Effect.7z is weapon-only mod.
You do not need SKSE or Dawnguard.
But you cannot fire projectiles.
You can crafted it in Dwarven menu and requires the perk.




Installing the mod is at the user\\\'s stake.

This mod uses the SKSE scripts

There can be a crash with other mods.




-Distribution-

If you tell me where it is from, you are free to use this mod\\\'s script or mesh models.
I look forward for a good mod.


Thanm you very much for K??? the scripts and YSDG for translation.
author: K Gorilla and Rizing
